scripts.install-deps: echo 'ğŸš€ Installing Dependencies...' && npm i && cd packages/types && npm i && cd ../logger && npm i && cd ../db && npm i && cd ../crypto && npm i && cd ../graphql && npm i && cd ../api-service && npm i && cd ../email && npm i
scripts.server: echo 'ğŸŒ Starting Server...' && cd packages/api-service && npm run start
scripts.server-dev: echo 'ğŸš§ Starting Server in Development Mode...' && cd packages/api-service && npm run dev
scripts.build-packages:
echo 'ğŸ—ï¸  Building Packages...' && npm run lint && cd packages/types && npm run build && cd ../logger && npm run build && cd ../db && npm run build && cd ../crypto && npm run build && cd ../graphql && npm run build && cd ../api-service && npm run build && cd ../email && npm run build && echo 'ğŸ¢ Build Complete!
'
scripts.test-packages:
